items.sentence: Tom has been teaching us French for the past four years.
Tom needs to be told that he\'s not required to do that.
Let\'s stay up all night and watch the sunrise together.
Let\'s stop and get something to eat before the concert.
Mary is one of the most beautiful girls I\'ve ever seen.
Don\'t forget to turn off the TV before you go to sleep.
Don\'t get me wrong. Tom is the best person for the job.
Even though I slept for twelve hours, I\'m still sleepy.
Do what Tom tells you to do and everything will be fine.
Do you have any idea how important your test grades are?
